#include<cstdio>
main()
{
    int test_cases;
    scanf("%d",&test_cases);
    for(int k=0;k<test_cases;k++)
    {
    	int a1,a2,a3,a4,ways,runs;
        scanf("%d",&runs);
        ways=0;
        for(a1=runs;a1>=0;a1-=6)
        {
            for(a2=a1;a2>=0;a2-=4)
            {
                for(a3=a2;a3>=0;a3-=2)
                {
                    ways++;
                }
            }
        }
 
        printf("%d\n",ways);
    }
 
return 0;
}
